description: Bangladesh, officially the People's Republic of Bangladesh, is a country in South Asia.
Thailand, officially the Kingdom of Thailand, is a country in Southeast Asia.
Indonesia, officially the Republic of Indonesia, is a country in Southeast Asia and Oceania.
Malaysia is a country in Southeast Asia.
Vietnam, officially the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, is a country in Southeast Asia.
Cambodia, officially known as the Kingdom of Cambodia, is a country located in the southern portion of the Indochinese peninsula in Southeast Asia.
